name: team_rename
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community The team name has changed  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					team:read 				 The team_rename event is sent to all connections for a team when an admin changes the team name. Clients can use this to update the display of the team name as soon as it changes. If they don't the client will receive the new name the next time it calls rtm.start.
